posts.title: I'm Writing My First Blog Post!
posts.author: Aaleeyah
posts.excerpt: First post using JSON post system. I will be adding more features soon.
posts.content: Well, I am writing my first blog post. I was thinking of using a middleware cms like buttercms or wordpress, but I decided to write my own. I am using a json file to store my posts. I will be adding more features to this blog soon. Stay tuned!

posts.excerpt: This is a dummy post to make sure things are rendering correctly.
posts.content: This is my dummy post, just making sure things get rendered correctly and all that cool jazz.

posts.title: Working on a Json Blog/Post system
posts.author: Aaleeyah
posts.excerpt: Details about my json blog system. What i want to do with it and how it's going so far.
posts.content: I don't want to invest in a CMS, so I am working on a json blog system. Right now, I have a json file filled with my blog posts, and maybe will add features to this soon like - add/delete blog post functionality. My current tech stack is Vue.js, Node.js, and Express.js with webpack and anime.js for animations.
